title: What does Pakistan gain from the 1947 partition? - Quora

response.answer_text: There was no real “partition” since Pakistan was part of the former British empire, not the country of India. Today Pakistan has a much higher living standard than India, much better infrastructure, less people per square mile, relatively less religious and ethnic strife. The percentage of hungry people is less in Pakistan. Today Pakistan’s total population is less than all of India’s population living below the poverty line.
